long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Title
MyWishlist

Summary
Save items you like while shopping online.

Description
MyWishlist is a convenient Chrome extension designed for online shoppers who want to easily save and manage items of interest. When you find something you love, simply add it to your wishlist, and it will be saved as a URL for quick access later. This makes revisiting potential purchases a breeze! Additionally, you can share your wishlist with friends or family, making it perfect for gift planning or group shopping. Enjoy a more organized and enjoyable online shopping experience with MyWishlist. Start saving your favorite items today!

Version 1.1
Improved the way images are extracted from certain websites.
